forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 11am. Sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 59. West southwest wind 5 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
The day unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, revealing a tranquil and sunny disposition as the morning fog, a transient whisper of the Pacific, lifts to surrender itself to clarity. With temperatures hovering near 72, this afternoon promises a gentle descent into a comfortable warmth, the marine layer retreating in the face of the persistent west-southwest wind. The gusts, persistent yet playful at around 17 miles per hour, carry with them the fresh scent of salt and adventure, inviting a leisurely exploration of the city's vibrant corridors.

As twilight approaches, the sky maintains its clarity, offering a soft, golden hue against a lingering backdrop of azure. The night will envelop the city in a tender embrace, beckoning a low of around 59 degrees, perfect for an evening stroll along the Embarcadero or a relaxed dinner outdoors. Dressing in layers will enable one to navigate the subtle shifts in temperature, perhaps donning a light jacket as the evening takes its turn. Whether it’s engaging with the artful cafes that line the streets or simply soaking in the serene views of the golden silhouette of the Golden Gate, today unfolds as an opportunity for the gentle pleasures of life in this iconic city.
